alfredsnippet.snippet:
https://books.google.com/books?id=M8RACwAAQBAJ&pg=PT515&lpg=PT515&dq=%22To+determine+if+the+runaway+greenhouse+effect+is+the+mechanism+that+is+heating+the+Venusian+atmosphere+from+above%22&source=bl&ots=UzuIH28xwZ&sig=pGI01tomRwKs-NpfBUehd5yAEAc&hl=en&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwid_p3ElqrWAhWhr1QKHbdiDI8Q6AEIKDAA#v=onepage&q=%22To%20determine%20if%20the%20runaway%20greenhouse%20effect%20is%20the%20mechanism%20that%20is%20heating%20the%20Venusian%20atmosphere%20from%20above%22&f=false

Newton, Einstein, and Velikovsky
Charles Ginenthal

"To determine if the runaway greenhouse effect is the mechanism that is heating the Venusian atmosphere from above ... or whether the hot subsurface of the planet is the source of the heat, a probe must be drilled below the Venus surface to find the temperature gradient.  If the scientific community's greenhouse mechanism is correct, the temperature beneath the Venusian surface should be cool with depth."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Crucial Venus Experiment
